meanings.definition: The style and arrangement of furnishings and other elements in a room.
meanings.sent1: The decor of the living room was elegant and cozy.
meanings.sent2: She changed the decor of her bedroom to match her favorite color.
meanings.sent3: The decor in the restaurant was so fancy, it made the food taste better!
meanings.sent4: The decor of the garden was like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The decor of the party was so vibrant, it felt like stepping into a fairy tale.

meanings.definition: To furnish or adorn with something ornamental.
meanings.sent1: She decided to decor her office desk with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: They decor the Christmas tree with sparkling lights and ornaments.
meanings.sent3: He tried to decor his bicycle with ribbons, but they kept falling off.
meanings.sent4: The artist decor the canvas with intricate patterns and designs.
meanings.sent5: The chef decor the cake with edible flowers, making it look like a work of art.
